Description: Fragment of round handle, nearly complete, of an Apulian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine red-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Label 'Type of the Corinthian Manubria'. Name Aninius. P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 40, type A5.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (338)
